<h1 align="center">
  Demo for Kick Interactive

Hi Kick! Thanks for taking the time to look over my project. I build it with GatsbyJS, so it is blazing fast ğŸš€. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to get in touch.

## âš™ Tech Used

- GatsbyJS
- CSS-in-JS (Styled-Components)

## ğŸ§ How to View

Note: You will need nodejs installed

Either install the Gatsby CLI or use NPX

```shell
npm install -g gatsby-cli
```

Build the site:

```shell
npx gatsby build
```

Serve the build locally:

```shell
npx gatsby serve
```

The project should now be available at localhost:8000

Detailed instructions on how to run a gatsby project can be found on [the gatsby website](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/docs/quick-start/)
